item.title: Hi. I'm Danni. Welcome.
item.description: I’m a PhD student in Microbiology with an interest in bioinformatics and data visualisation. I started blogging some of the issues I encountered when I started this journey in the hope they save someone else a lot of googling! I’m still learning and welcome constructive feedback. My interests range from science and data analysis to music festivals, photography and cycling. I also love exploring lands near and far with my rescue dog Seth.
